x10.matrix

Class RandTool

  • x10.matrix.RandTool

  • public class RandTool
    Provide random value generation methods which can be used to generate random numbers in normal or unified distribution.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandTool()

      Get a random integer number
      static x10.lang.Int nextNormalRandDst(x10.lang.Double avg)
      Return a non-negative random integer in normal distribution, using the mean specified as avg.
      static x10.lang.Int nextUniRandDst(x10.lang.Double max)
      Return a non-negative random integer in uniform distribution.

      • nextNormalRandDst

        public static x10.lang.Int nextNormalRandDst(x10.lang.Double avg)
        Return a non-negative random integer in normal distribution, using the mean specified as avg. The standard deviation is avg/2.

      • nextUniRandDst

        public static x10.lang.Int nextUniRandDst(x10.lang.Double max)
        Return a non-negative random integer in uniform distribution. The mean is specified by avg within the range of [1, 2 avg]
